scripts.deploy: npm run compile && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ posix4e/humansubgraph
scripts.create-local: npm run compile && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ posix4e/humansubgraph
scripts.remove-local: npm run compile && graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ posix4e/humansubgraph
scripts.deploy-local: npm run compile && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 posix4e/humansubgraph
